fullText: The Mystery of Edwin Drood is a show that knows exactly what it is: a cheerfully artificial entertainment that makes no bones about its artificiality. It's a musical that celebrates the very idea of musicals, and does so with such gusto that you can't help but be swept along.
dtliExcerpt: The Mystery of Edwin Drood is a show that knows exactly what it is: a cheerfully artificial entertainment that makes no bones about its artificiality. It's a musical that celebrates the very idea of musicals, and does so with such gusto that you can't help but be swept along.
bwwExcerpt: Drood, ultimately, is not a complete show so much as an expandable playspace, and with performers of this caliber, an evening of yeasty, nudge-nudge-wink-wink British good humor is more or less guaranteed. The show-within-the-show may drone a bit, but the show-around-the-show sparkles.
